output:
I read the pages of a book I read when I was at school
I don't remember anything except that I cried for it
And you held my hand and I smiled
I was the happiest for a while
It was the story of a man
Who lost his life for a friend
With no questions and no chance
To turn around and leave again
And you held my hand and I smiled
I was the happiest for a while
Now it's time for us to change
Our point of view about these things
Let's put to bed the old world
Forget all the things they stole
And you held my hand and I smiled
I was the happiest for a while
